modmenu.descriptionTranslation.networkpr: A Minecraft mod with support for HTTP/SOCKS5 proxies and per-server proxy configuration.
config.networkproxy.title: Network Proxy Settings
config.networkproxy.use_filter.tooltip: If enabled, only servers in the list below will use the proxy.
config.networkproxy.domain_list.tooltip: Example: hypixel.net (Changes take effect on next connection)
